item.title: Tokenomics: Explained
item.description: Why so some cryptocurrencies hold long-term while others fade away? A close look at the tokenomics of the project can explain how supply, demand, and incentives shape these outcomes.

item.title: About Us
item.description:
Created by high schoolers curious about economics and innovation

Future Economists is a student-run publication where high schoolers research and write about how emerging technologies are affecting the economy, both on the local and global scales.

Here Are Some Topics That We Focus On

AI & Automation

How artificial intelligence is creating new companies, changing job markets, and reshaping entire industries.

Cryptocurrency & Blockchain

The economics of digital money, DeFi, and how blockchain technology challenges traditional finance.

item.title: Discover Our Mission
item.description: Future Economists is a student-created journal dedicated to researching how and why emerging technologies will reshape the global economic landscape.

item.title: Join the Team
item.description:
Explore Technology and Economics With Us!

We’re looking for high school students who want to research emerging technologies and write about their economic impact.

No experience is required, just a passion for writing, researching, and learning.

What We Do

We do research on technologies like AI, blockchain, clean energy, and biotech, and write articles explaining their economic impacts.

Things like: “How is AI changing the job market?” “How is the Blockchain challenging traditional banking systems?” “What affect will clean energy have on economic efficiency?”
